article.title: ITT Receives Order for Systems to Thwart Improvised Explosive Devices
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ITT Corporation has been awarded a $206 million contract to produce an additional 2,866 CREW 2.1 vehicle receiver jammers, vehicle-mounted systems designed to prevent the detonation of improvised explosive devices. The contract was awarded by the U.S. Naval Sea Systems Command and was announced by the U.S. Defense Department.
